system.description:
You twirl your blade and twist your fingers into a mudra, granting the catfish meditation upon an ally.

Spend 1 Beat: you or an ally in range 3 gains Evade on the next attack against them.

Naga Mentala: Spend 2 Beats to inscribe the name of water dragons. You and all allies in burst 3 gain Evade until the end of their next riff.

Deep Sea Serpent Mentala: Spend 3 Beats fully inscribe the surat of the deep sea serpent. All allies in the battlefield instead gain Dragon Evade (75% of dodging an attack) against the next attack. If the attack is successfully dodged because of this, the ally may rush 3.
system.flavor: Bladeweaver Master Samudera Ijak, to defeat a firebreathing naga that lived in the heart of a volcano to submission, learned this mentala from the ancient catfish spirit in the rivers of his hometown.
